text:
Los Angeles Angels | Angels.com | Anaheim, CA | Assistant Baseball Systems Developer

Come join the LA Angels baseball operations department's analytics team as our third full time developer. Since we are a small team you will get a chance to contribute throughout the full tech stack on a variety of different projects and technologies including C#, Python, Node.js, Angular, and Microsoft SQL Server. This is a unique role for someone who has a passion for baseball and wants to join a MLB front office to see the software they build contribute to wins and loses on the field.

The full ad is available through the below link. All applications need to be submitted through there, but feel free to forward any questions over to bbops.dev@angels.com

http://baseballjobs.teamworkonline.com/teamwork/jobs/jobskey...
